name: mailjet
description: E-Com Plus app to integrate [Mailjet](https://www.mailjet.com/) for transactional emails

scripts.dev: APP_NAME=Mailjet-dev APP_BASE_URI=https://talisson.ngrok.io ECOM_AUTH_DB=/var/dbs/mailjet.sqlite LOGGER_OUTPUT=/var/log/nodejs/ses.out LOGGER_ERRORS=/var/log/nodejs/ses.error nodemon main.js
